title: impact
description: Impact is used throughout the STIX specification wherever a construct needs to represent estimated or actual impact as a result of a threat.

level.description: The estimated severity of the impact

intended_effects.description: A list of effects that the threat intends to create (e.g. fraud, harrassment)

description.description: A prose description of the impact

confidence.description: The confidence of this impact statement, using the STIX vocabulary
